questions.question: What is the best book you've ever read and why?

answers.answer: The best book I've ever read is a classic, Harry Potter. I've grew up with the saga, since I was a child until now. This made all of my childhood and a part of my teenage.
J.K. Rowling is a very good writter. She's able to find the good words to describe an amazing landscapes and a wonderful universe with strange creatures where the magic is daily.
In addition, 8 movies were shot, and this makes the saga and the characters more real. It's rare when the movie are to the novel's level, but here it a success.
